page.title: 05Fashions In Stanhope.
page.content: The ladies in Stanhope this year will be wearing clothes in pastel shades. Jeans are still very popular made of denim,but canvas jeans are becoming more popular.Skirts and tops are fashionable for ladies from thirty upwards.The clothes are mostly made of cotton and man made fibres like terylene,nylon and acrylic.The most fashionable footwear is Tucker boots. The problems of owning a fashion shop are keeping up with the fashion. Baby clothes are mostly bought for gifts,but a lot of mothers buy wool to knit traditional styles for their babies.Men mostly wear casual shirts, cotton or terylene trousers and shoes. The prices of these clothes range from Â£2_Â£100. The hair fashion is mostly long at the back, short on top and permed to make it wavey.
